pullRequest.title: Fixes #682 - Added support for GTS Encoders in PIVOT

commit.message: Fixes #682 - Added support for GTS Encoders in PIVOT

nodes.bodyText: Should binary values be also checked? If so, a more optimal way than using getBinaryValue should be used.
Creating and using a subclass of RuntimeException could be nicer.
Catch the RuntimeException to display a nice error message.
I agree. It will could be usefull for other functions too.
